name: Ferrule
description: Have you ever been writing an expose on tacos and looked at your pencil and thought what is that metal thingy on the end? If you're like 1 in 3 internet people then this is the place for you.

name: Birria
description: Have you ever been on social media scrolling mindlessly and wondered what are those tacos these kids are dipping in a cup of juice?

name: NBA
description: Your one stop spot for anything NBA related, talk about scores, rumors, or if Lebron has enough help.

name: Reality TV
description: If you like watching people with no real skills or careers, go to dinner parties and fundraisers , then this is your place.

name: Karens-R-US
description: A place to complain and vent about everyday issues that arent really worth making a scene over , but you cant help yourself.

name: Sewer Turtles
description: A place to talk about mutated turtles abandon in the NYC sewers with only unwanted greasy old pizza to eat.

name: Cars That Go Boom
description: If you like the  cars, the cars that go BOOM then this is the place for you!
